recipe.title: Spicy Red-Pepper and Eggplant Confit
ingredients: 1 (1 1/2-lb) eggplant, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
1 (28-oz) can whole tomatoes in juice, drained and coarsely chopped
instructions: Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 400°F. Cut peppers into 1-inch pieces. Toss together all ingredients in a large roasting pan, then spread evenly. Roast, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are very tender, about 1 hour. Cool before serving.
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 400°F.
